mapper.select: select goods_review.rev_code, goods_review.user_code, gds_code, rev_title, rev_cont, rev_yn, rev_pwd, rev_reg_date, rev_rating, rev_refs, user_id from goods_review, user where gds_code = #{gdsCode} and goods_review.user_code = user.user_code
select rev_img_url from review_images where rev_code = #{revCode}
select ifnull(avg(rev_rating), 0) as avg, count(rev_rating) as count from goods_review where gds_code = #{gdsCode}
